CustomField.formula: IF( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c <=4999, ( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c * 0.0471), IF( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c <=14999, ( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c * 0.0454), IF( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c <=24999, ( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c * 0.0445), IF( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c <=49999, ( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c * 0.0438), IF( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c <=250000, ( Cash_Opportunity_Total__c * 0.0436), 1.00)))))
CustomField.label: Cash FMV 24 Month Lease Payment
